metadata.title: CVE-2018-9019 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: SQL Injection vulnerability in Dolibarr before version 7.0.2 allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the sortfield parameter to/accountancy/admin/accountmodel.php,/accountancy/admin/categories_list.php,/accountancy/admin/journals_list.php, /admin/dict.php,/admin/mails_templates.php, or /admin/website.php.

criterions.comment: dolibarr package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
